body: Pimping buses in Kigali, Rwanda: "Rwanda’s city buses are quite as tricked out or chaotic as the matatus of regional neighbours. However, there are plenty of bus owners in town who take the time to pimp their rides. As far as I understand it so long as the yellow line around the vehicle is visible, the owners can pretty much do whatever they want to the paintwork."

title: Rwanda: iPhone on the Kigali buses

sentence: Pimping buses in Kigali, Rwanda: "Rwanda’s city buses are quite as tricked out or chaotic as the matatus of regional neighbours.
However, there are plenty of bus owners in town who take the time to pimp their rides.
As far as I understand it so long as the yellow line around the vehicle is visible, the owners can pretty much do whatever they want to the paintwork."
